statements: DELETE FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE part_name = 'Engine Oil' AND part_category = 'Fluids';
DELETE FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE part_quantity < 10 AND part_location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE part_category = 'Electrical' AND part_unit_price > 100.00;
DELETE FROM devices WHERE device_id = 101 AND device_type = 'Laptop';
DELETE FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity < 5 AND price > 1000;
DELETE FROM DevicePartsMap WHERE part_id = 2002 AND device_id = 3003;
DELETE FROM DevicePartsMap WHERE device_id = 5678 AND part_id = 9876;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Repair' AND technician = 'John Doe';
